resources.string: Give me a meme text for a cute cat staring blankly at the camera
Give me a meme text for a confident muscular man
Give me an ironic meme text for a dog sitting calmly at a table inside a burning house
Give me an meme text for a waiting skeleton
Give me a meme text for a person hitting a button really quick as soon as they see the button. The meme text should be a situation in which someone will grab something as soon as they see it.
Fill anything funny in the blank, and make sure you repeat the whole sentence, not just saying only the word in the blank: Brace yourselves, BLANK is coming.
Fill something funny in the blank, and make sure you repeat the whole sentence, not just saying only the word in the blank: Wake up babe, BLANK.
Fill a funny noun and maybe with an adjective in the blank, and make sure you repeat the whole sentence, not just saying only the word in the blank: Finally, BLANK.
